title: The Haunting of Hattie Hastings
description: Some people just won't take death lying down …!Part one of a fun-filled but moving romantic comedy about life, death and letting go.Hattie Hastings is happily married, even if husband Gary drives her up the wall at times. When tragedy strikes, she is left alone and heartbroken, with only an assortment of family and friends to prop her up.Struggling to cope, she is left reeling when her deceased other half returns to haunt her, popping up at the most inappropriate times, with an unorthodox way of flagging his arrival.Hattie struggles to convince anyone that Gary has returned. Not even her best friend, Cat – now free from the cruel and controlling Stewart – will believe her story.Why has Gary returned? Will he allow Hattie to find happiness again, or will he stand in the way of any future romance? And what will Cat do when her slimy ex-husband tries to worm his way back into her affections?The Haunting of Hattie Hastings will make you laugh, cry and count the weeks until Part Two …
author: Audrey   Davis
